1.eng-name: The Book of Purification and its Sunnah

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Abu Hurairah said:"The Messenger of Allah said: 'The (following) was revealed about the people of Quba': 'In it (the mosque) are men who love to clean and purify themselves. And Allah loves those who make themselves clean and pure.'" He said: 'They used to clean themselves with water (after urinating), and this Verse was revealed concerning them
